org.ensembl.driver
Interface GeneAdaptor

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptor, FeatureAdaptor, java.rmi.Remote
All Known Subinterfaces:
LockableGeneAdaptor
public interface GeneAdaptor
extends FeatureAdaptor

Provides access to genes in the datasource.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String TYPE
          Name of the default GeneAdaptor available from a driver.
